mapper.select: SELECT trade_date, ROUND(AVG(price)) AS avgPrice, MAX(price) AS maxPrice, MIN(price) AS minPrice, SUM(price) AS totalPrice, SUM(volume) AS totalVolume, openPrice, endPrice, nvl(ROUND(((endPrice - LAG(endPrice) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(endPrice) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) * 100, 2), 0) AS rateOfChange FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(trade_date, 'YY-MM-DD') AS trade_date, price, volume, FIRST_VALUE(price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_DATE(trade_date, 'YY-MM-DD') ORDER BY timestamp ASC) AS openPrice, LAST_VALUE(price) OVER (PARTITION BY TO_DATE(trade_date, 'YY-MM-DD') ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS endPrice FROM stock ) sub GROUP BY trade_date, openPrice, endPrice ORDER BY trade_date
